name: Punchy Ship
description:
--Fullscreen & Controller Recommended--

Punchy ship is an arcade style defense game where instead of shooting your enemies, you have to punch them! It's as simple as defending the gem in the center of the screen from an onslaught of incoming enemies (who may or may not get tougher over time) Be wary of the effect of gravity on your ship. 

Game runs best on Firefox and Edge. Do not use chrome, it will lag!!

Controls:

-A & D keys/Left joystick: Rotate your ship

-Space/Right trigger: Accelerate your ship

-Left-click/A button: Punch!

-Esc: Return to title screen

My Personal High-Score is 67!
